(base 18 decimals)","_tickerRegFee":"is the ticker registration fee (base 18 decimals)"}},"changeSecurityLaunchFee(uint256)":{"params":{"_stLaunchFee":"is the registration fee in USD tokens (base 18 of securityToken will be generated","_ticker":"is the ticker symbol of the security token","_tokenDetails":"is the off-chain details of the token","_treasuryWallet":"Ethereum address which will holds the STs."}},"generateSecurityToken(string,string,string,bool)":{"details":"this function is for backwards compatibilty with 2.0 dApp.","params":{"_divisible":"is whether or not the token is token"}},"getExpiryLimit()":{"returns":{"expiry":"limit"}},"getFees(bytes32)":{"params":{"_feeType":"Key corresponding to fee type"}},"getIsFeeInPoly()":{"returns":{"isInPoly":"true = poly, false = token"},"returns":{"tokenAddress":"address"}},"getSecurityTokenData(address)":{"params":{"_securityToken":"is the address of the security token."},"returns":{"tokenAddress":"address is the issuer of the security Token.","tokenDetails":"string is the details of the security token.","tokenSymbol":"string is the ticker of the security Token.","tokenTime":"uint256 is the timestamp at which security Token was deployed."}},"getSecurityTokenLaunchFee()":{"returns":{"fee":"amount"}},"getTickerDetails(string)":{"params":{"_ticker":"ticker"},"returns":{"tickerExpiry":"uint256","tickerOwner":"address","tickerRegistration":"uint256","tickerStatus":"bool","tokenName":"string"}},"getTickerOwner(string)":{"params":{"_ticker":"Ticker whose owner need to determine"},"returns":{"owner":"address Address of the owner"}},"getTickerRegistrationFee()":{"returns":{"fee":"amount"}},"getTickerStatus(string)":{"params":{"_ticker":"Ticker whose status need to determine"},"returns":{"status":"bool"}},"getTickersByOwner(address)":{"params":{"_owner":"Address which owns the list of tickers"}},"getTokens()":{"details":"Intention is that this is called off-chain so block gas limit is not relevant"},"getTokensByDelegate(address)":{"details":"Intention is that this is called off-chain so block gas limit is not relevant","params":{"_owner":"is the address which owns the list of tickers"}},"isPaused()":{"returns":{"paused":"bool"}},"isSecurityToken(address)":{"params":{"_securityToken":"Address of the Scurity of the token"}},"modifyExistingTicker(address,string,uint256,uint256,bool)":{"params":{"_expiryDate":"is the expiry date for the ticker","_owner":"is the owner of the token","_registrationDate":"is ticker"}},"modifySecurityToken(string,string,address,address,string,uint256)":{"params":{"_deployedAt":"Timestamp at which security token comes deployed on the ethereum blockchain","_name":"Name of token"}},"modifyTicker(address,string,string,uint256,uint256,bool)":{"params":{"_expiryDate":"Expiry date of the ticker","_owner":"Owner of the token","_registrationDate":"Date on which ticker get registered","_status":"Token deployed status","_ticker":"Token ticker","_tokenName":"Name of the token"}},"owner()":{"returns":{"ownerAddress":"address owner"}},"reclaimERC20(address)":{"params":{"_tokenContract":"is the address of the token contract"}},"refreshSecurityToken(string,string,string,bool,address)":{"details":"This function needs to be in STR 3.0. Defined public to avoid stack overflow","params":{"_divisible":"is whether or not the token is divisible","_name":"is the name of the token","_ticker":"is the ticker symbol of the security token","_tokenDetails":"is the off-chain details of the token"}},"registerNewTicker(address,string)":{"params":{"_owner":"is address of the owner of the token","_ticker":"is unique token ticker"}},"registerTicker(address,string,string)":{"params":{"_owner":"Address of the owner of the token","_ticker":"Token ticker","_tokenName":"Name of the token"}},"removeProtocolFactory(uint8,uint8,uint8)":{"params":{"_major":"Major version of the proxy.","_minor":"Minor version of the proxy.","_patch":"Patch version of the contract"}},"setLatestVersion(uint8,uint8,uint8)":{"params":{"_major":"Major version of the proxy.","_minor":"Minor version of the proxy.","_patch":"Patch version of the proxy"}},"setProtocolFactory(address,uint8,uint8,uint8)":{"params":{"_STFactoryAddress":"is the address of the proxy.","_major":"Major version of the proxy.","_minor":"Minor version of the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"_newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}},"transferTickerOwnership(address,string)":{"details":"_newOwner Address whom ownership to transfer_ticker Ticker"},"updatePolyTokenAddress(address)":{"params":{"_newAddress":"is the address of the polytoken."}}},"title":"Interface for the Polymath Security Token Registry contract","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"changeExpiryLimit(uint256)":{"notice":"Changes the expiry time for the token ticker"},"changeFeesAmountAndCurrency(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Sets the ticker registration and ST launch fee amount and currency"},"changeSecurityLaunchFee(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the ticker registration fee in USD tokens. Only Polymath."},"changeTickerRegistrationFee(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the ticker registration fee in USD tokens. Only Polymath."},"generateNewSecurityToken(string,string,string,bool,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Deploys an instance of a new Security Token and records it to the registry"},"generateSecurityToken(string,string,string,bool)":{"notice":"Deploys an instance of a new Security Token of version 2.0 and records it to the registry"},"getExpiryLimit()":{"notice":"Gets the expiry limit"},"getFees(bytes32)":{"notice":"Returns the usd & poly fee for a particular feetype"},"getIsFeeInPoly()":{"notice":"Gets the fee currency"},"getLatestProtocolVersion()":{"notice":"Get Protocol version"},"getSTFactoryAddress()":{"notice":"Get the current STFactory Address"},"getSTFactoryAddressOfVersion(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the STFactory Address of a particular version"},"getSecurityTokenAddress(string)":{"notice":"Get security token address by ticker name"},"getSecurityTokenData(address)":{"notice":"Returns the security token data by address"},"getSecurityTokenLaunchFee()":{"notice":"Gets the security token launch fee"},"getTickerDetails(string)":{"notice":"Returns the owner and timestamp for a given ticker"},"getTickerOwner(string)":{"notice":"Gets the owner of the ticker"},"getTickerRegistrationFee()":{"notice":"Gets the ticker registration fee"},"getTickerStatus(string)":{"notice":"Gets the status of the ticker"},"getTickersByOwner(address)":{"notice":"Used to get the ticker list as per the owner"},"getTokens()":{"notice":"Returns the list of all tokens"},"getTokensByDelegate(address)":{"notice":"Returns the list of tokens to which the delegate has some access"},"getTokensByOwner(address)":{"notice":"Returns the list of tokens owned by the selected address"},"isPaused()":{"notice":"Checks whether the registry is paused or not"},"isSecurityToken(address)":{"notice":"Check that Security Token is registered"},"modifyExistingSecurityToken(string,address,address,string,uint256)":{"notice":"Adds a new custom Security Token and saves it to the registry. (Token should follow the ISecurityToken interface)"},"modifyExistingTicker(address,string,uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Modifies the ticker details. Only Polymath has the ability to do so.Only allowed to modify the tickers which are not yet deployed."},"modifySecurityToken(string,string,address,address,string,uint256)":{"notice":"Adds a new custom Security Token and saves it to the registry. (Token should follow the ISecurityToken interface)"},"modifyTicker(address,string,string,uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Modifies the ticker details. Only polymath account has the ability to do so. Only allowed to modify the tickers which are not yet deployed"},"owner()":{"notice":"Gets the owner of the contract"},"pause()":{"notice":"Called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state"},"reclaimERC20(address)":{"notice":"Reclaims all ERC20Basic compatible tokens"},"refreshSecurityToken(string,string,string,bool,address)":{"notice":"Deploys an instance of a new Security Token and replaces the old one in the registry This can be used to upgrade from version 2.0 of ST to 3.0 or in case something goes wrong with earlier ST"},"registerNewTicker(address,string)":{"notice":"Registers the token ticker to the selected ownerOnce the token ticker is registered to its owner then no other issuer can claimits ownership. If the ticker expires and its issuer hasn't used it, then someone else can take it."},"registerTicker(address,string,string)":{"notice":"Registers the token ticker for its particular owneronce the token ticker is registered to its owner then no other issuer can claimits ownership. If the ticker expires and its issuer hasn't used it, then someone else can take it."},"removeProtocolFactory(uint8,uint8,uint8)":{"notice":"Removes a STFactory"},"removeTicker(string)":{"notice":"Removes the ticker details and associated ownership & security token mapping"},"setGetterRegistry(address)":{"notice":"Set the getter contract address"},"setLatestVersion(uint8,uint8,uint8)":{"notice":"Changes the default protocol versionUsed only by Polymath to upgrade the SecurityToken contract and add more functionalities to future versionsChanging versions does not affect existing tokens."},"setProtocolFactory(address,uint8,uint8,uint8)":{"notice":"Changes the SecurityToken contract for a particular factory versionUsed only by Polymath to upgrade the SecurityToken contract and add more functionalities to future versionsChanging versions does not affect existing tokens."},"tickerAvailable(string)":{"notice":"Checks if the entered ticker is registered and has not expired"},"transferTickerOwnership(address,string)":{"notice":"Transfers the ownership of the ticker"},"unpause()":{"notice":"Called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state"},"updateFromRegistry()":{"notice":"Used to update the polyToken contract address"},"updatePolyTokenAddress(address)":{"notice":"Changes the PolyToken address. Only Polymath."}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/interfaces/ISecurityTokenRegistry.sol":"ISecurityTokenRegistry"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"project:/contracts/interfaces/ISecurityTokenRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0xeed12f913d6d8c3daa499883ae8a2b131d4401499488c1fbee13e64ff5bf0021","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d67253369e59370ea272a2ce721b9f2decdd8b2d917a94c31a9560cd50485aa5","dweb:/ipfs/QmXGd2wvAA5NixY8vobc7dQsND5cWft7Qozg6iNWCxxyDq"]}},"version":1}

documentation.text: @title Interface for the Polymath Security Token Registry contract

@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
 @param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
@notice Get the current STFactory Address

@notice Returns the STFactory Address of a particular version
 @param _protocolVersion Packed protocol version
@notice Get Protocol version

@notice Used to get the ticker list as per the owner
 @param _owner Address which owns the list of tickers

@notice Returns the list of all tokens
 @dev Intention is that this is called off-chain so block gas limit is not relevant

@notice Removes the ticker details and associated ownership & security token mapping
 @param _ticker Token ticker

@notice Changes the expiry time for the token ticker
 @param _newExpiry New time period for token ticker expiry

@notice Sets the ticker registration fee in USD tokens. Only Polymath.
 @param _tickerRegFee is the registration fee in USD tokens (base 18 decimals)

@notice Sets the ticker registration fee in USD tokens. Only Polymath.
 @param _stLaunchFee is the registration fee in USD tokens (base 18 decimals)

@notice Changes the PolyToken address. Only Polymath.
 @param _newAddress is the address of the polytoken.
@notice Used to update the polyToken contract address

@notice Gets the security token launch fee
 @return fee amount

@notice Gets the ticker registration fee
 @return fee amount

@notice Set the getter contract address
 @param _getterContract Address of the contract

@notice Returns the usd & poly fee for a particular feetype
 @param _feeType Key corresponding to fee type

@notice Gets the expiry limit
 @return expiry limit

@notice Gets the fee currency
 @return isInPoly true = poly, false = usd

@notice Checks whether the registry is paused or not
 @return paused bool
@notice Called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
@notice Called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

@notice Reclaims all ERC20Basic compatible tokens
 @param _tokenContract is the address of the token contract

@notice Gets the owner of the contract
 @return ownerAddress address owner

params._newExpiry: New time period for token ticker expiry

params._isFeeInPoly: defines if the fee is in poly or usd
params._stLaunchFee: is the st generation fee (base 18 decimals)
params._tickerRegFee: is the ticker registration fee (base 18 decimals)

params._stLaunchFee: is the registration fee in USD tokens (base 18 decimals)

params._tickerRegFee: is the registration fee in USD tokens (base 18 decimals)

params._divisible: is whether or not the token is divisible
params._name: is the name of the token
params._protocolVersion: Version of securityToken contract - `_protocolVersion` is the packed value of uin8[3] array (it will be calculated offchain) - if _protocolVersion == 0 then latest version of securityToken will be generated
params._ticker: is the ticker symbol of the security token
params._tokenDetails: is the off-chain details of the token
params._treasuryWallet: Ethereum address which will holds the STs.

generateSecurityToken(string,string,stri.details: this function is for backwards compatibilty with 2.0 dApp.

params._divisible: is whether or not the token is divisible
params._name: is the name of the token
params._ticker: is the ticker symbol of the security token
params._tokenDetails: is the off-chain details of the token

params._securityToken: is the address of the security token.

returns.tokenAddress: address is the issuer of the security Token.
returns.tokenDetails: string is the details of the security token.
returns.tokenSymbol: string is the ticker of the security Token.
returns.tokenTime: uint256 is the timestamp at which security Token was deployed.

params._ticker: Ticker whose owner need to determine
Ticker whose status need to determine

params._owner: Address which owns the list of tickers

getTokens().details: Intention is that this is called off-chain so block gas limit is not relevant

getTokensByDelegate(address).details: Intention is that this is called off-chain so block gas limit is not relevant

params._delegate: is the address for the delegate

getTokensByOwner(address).details: Intention is that this is called off-chain so block gas limit is not relevant

params._owner: is the address which owns the list of tickers

params._deployedAt: is the timestamp at which the security token is deployed
params._owner: is the owner of the token
params._securityToken: is the address of the securityToken
params._ticker: is the ticker symbol of the security token
params._tokenDetails: is the off-chain details of the token

params._expiryDate: is the expiry date for the ticker
params._owner: is the owner of the token
params._registrationDate: is the date at which ticker is registered

params._deployedAt: Timestamp at which security token comes deployed on the ethereum blockchain

params._registrationDate: Date on which ticker get registered

params._tokenContract: is the address of the token contract

refreshSecurityToken(string,string,strin.details: This function needs to be in STR 3.0. Defined public to avoid stack overflow

params._divisible: is whether or not the token is divisible
params._name: is the name of the token
params._ticker: is the ticker symbol of the security token
params._tokenDetails: is the off-chain details of the token

params._owner: is address of the owner of the token
Address of the owner of the token

params._STFactoryAddress: is the address of the proxy.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferTickerOwnership(address,string).details: _newOwner Address whom ownership to transfer_ticker Ticker

params._newAddress: is the address of the polytoken.

devdoc.title: Interface for the Polymath Security Token Registry contract

changeExpiryLimit(uint256).notice: Changes the expiry time for the token ticker

changeFeesAmountAndCurrency(uint256,uint.notice: Sets the ticker registration and ST launch fee amount and currency

changeSecurityLaunchFee(uint256).notice: Sets the ticker registration fee in USD tokens. Only Polymath.

changeTickerRegistrationFee(uint256).notice: Sets the ticker registration fee in USD tokens. Only Polymath.

generateNewSecurityToken(string,string,s.notice: Deploys an instance of a new Security Token and records it to the registry

generateSecurityToken(string,string,stri.notice: Deploys an instance of a new Security Token of version 2.0 and records it to the registry

getFees(bytes32).notice: Returns the usd & poly fee for a particular feetype

getSTFactoryAddressOfVersion(uint256).notice: Returns the STFactory Address of a particular version

getSecurityTokenAddress(string).notice: Get security token address by ticker name

getSecurityTokenData(address).notice: Returns the security token data by address

getSecurityTokenLaunchFee().notice: Gets the security token launch fee

getTickerDetails(string).notice: Returns the owner and timestamp for a given ticker

getTickerOwner(string).notice: Gets the owner of the ticker

getTickerStatus(string).notice: Gets the status of the ticker

getTickersByOwner(address).notice: Used to get the ticker list as per the owner

getTokens().notice: Returns the list of all tokens

getTokensByDelegate(address).notice: Returns the list of tokens to which the delegate has some access

getTokensByOwner(address).notice: Returns the list of tokens owned by the selected address

isPaused().notice: Checks whether the registry is paused or not

isSecurityToken(address).notice: Check that Security Token is registered

modifyExistingSecurityToken(string,addre.notice: Adds a new custom Security Token and saves it to the registry. (Token should follow the ISecurityToken interface)

modifyExistingTicker(address,string,uint.notice: Modifies the ticker details. Only Polymath has the ability to do so.Only allowed to modify the tickers which are not yet deployed.

modifySecurityToken(string,string,addres.notice: Adds a new custom Security Token and saves it to the registry. (Token should follow the ISecurityToken interface)

modifyTicker(address,string,string,uint2.notice: Modifies the ticker details. Only polymath account has the ability to do so. Only allowed to modify the tickers which are not yet deployed

owner().notice: Gets the owner of the contract

pause().notice: Called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

refreshSecurityToken(string,string,strin.notice: Deploys an instance of a new Security Token and replaces the old one in the registry This can be used to upgrade from version 2.0 of ST to 3.0 or in case something goes wrong with earlier ST

registerNewTicker(address,string).notice: Registers the token ticker to the selected ownerOnce the token ticker is registered to its owner then no other issuer can claimits ownership. If the ticker expires and its issuer hasn't used it, then someone else can take it.

registerTicker(address,string,string).notice: Registers the token ticker for its particular owneronce the token ticker is registered to its owner then no other issuer can claimits ownership. If the ticker expires and its issuer hasn't used it, then someone else can take it.

removeTicker(string).notice: Removes the ticker details and associated ownership & security token mapping

setLatestVersion(uint8,uint8,uint8).notice: Changes the default protocol versionUsed only by Polymath to upgrade the SecurityToken contract and add more functionalities to future versionsChanging versions does not affect existing tokens.

setProtocolFactory(address,uint8,uint8,u.notice: Changes the SecurityToken contract for a particular factory versionUsed only by Polymath to upgrade the SecurityToken contract and add more functionalities to future versionsChanging versions does not affect existing tokens.

tickerAvailable(string).notice: Checks if the entered ticker is registered and has not expired

transferTickerOwnership(address,string).notice: Transfers the ownership of the ticker

unpause().notice: Called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

updateFromRegistry().notice: Used to update the polyToken contract address

updatePolyTokenAddress(address).notice: Changes the PolyToken address. Only Polymath.
